Title: Errant-Questor
Intro: An Errant-Questor is a single model. He is armed with a Rune-etched Greatblade.

Rules.Name: Implacable Determination
Rules.Fluff: Until his oath is fulfilled, an Errant-Questor’s will is such that he is all but inviolable.
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES When you make save rolls for an Errant-Questor, ignore the enemy’s Rend characteristic.

Rules.Name: Relentless Purpose
Rules.Rule: You can re-roll failed charge rolls for an Errant-Questor.
